downloadTitle: Cumulative Update 27 for Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2013
downloadDescription: Over the last few years we've shipped a series of new releases that have transformed Microsoft Dynamics NAV and your market opportunity. The goal is to make it even easier to use and adding capabilities design to support SMB business ambitions.
